Package org.zurdavid.petrinets

Interface IReachabilityGraph

All Known Implementing Classes:
ReachabilityGraph
public interface IReachabilityGraph
The interface provides methods to build a reachability graph, get a collection of markings in the graph and a collection of outgoing edges for a given marking in the graph. It is used by the applications controller to build reachability graphs and perform boundedness analyses and the view to display the data (see GSReachabilityViewerListener.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    RGUpdateResult
    addMarking(Transition t, Marking preFiring, Marking postFiring)

    List<RGEdge>
    getEdges(Marking m)
    The method returns the outgoing edges of a passed in Marking.
    Marking
    getInitialMarking()
    The method returns the current Petri net's initial marking.
    Collection<Marking>
    getMarkings()
    A collection containing all Markings in the graph.

  • Method Details

    • addMarking

      RGUpdateResult addMarking(Transition t, Marking preFiring, Marking postFiring)
      The method adds an edge / transition and the resulting marking to the graph if they are not part of the graph already add returns information on what was added.
      Parameters:
      t - The transition that fired.
      preFiring - Marking before transition fired.
      postFiring - Marking after transition fired.
      Returns:
      Wheter or not an edge and / or marking was added to the graph.

    • getInitialMarking

      Marking getInitialMarking()
      The method returns the current Petri net's initial marking.
      Returns:
      The initial Marking.

    • getMarkings

      Collection<Marking> getMarkings()
      A collection containing all Markings in the graph.
      Returns:
      A collection containing all Markings in the graph.

    • getEdges

      List<RGEdge> getEdges(Marking m)
      The method returns the outgoing edges of a passed in Marking.
      Parameters:
      m - The marking.
      Returns:
      A list of outgoing edges.
